Tenant.title: Tenant
Tenant.description: Represents a cafe tenant in the AirCafe application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the tenant entity.

nama.description: The name of the cafe. 'nama' instead of 'name'.

slug.description: A unique URL-friendly string identifying the cafe.

logoUrl.description: URL of the cafe's logo image.

qrisImageUrl.description: URL of the cafe's QRIS image for payments.

tokenHarian.description: The daily verification token for anti-spam.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the AirCafe application, including admins.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity. This corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.

tenantId.description: Reference to Tenant. The ID of the tenant this user belongs to. (Relationship: Tenant 1:N User)

role.description: The role of the user (e.g., admin_kafe).

email.description: The email address of the user.

Menu.title: Menu
Menu.description: Represents a menu item offered by a cafe.

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item.

tenantId.description: Reference to Tenant. The ID of the tenant that owns this menu item. (Relationship: Tenant 1:N Menu)

categoryId.description: Reference to Category. The ID of the category this menu item belongs to. (Relationship: Category 1:N Menu)

name.description: The name of the menu item.

description.description: A description of the menu item.

imageUrl.description: URL of the menu item's image.

price.description: The price of the menu item.

isAvailable.description: The availability status of the menu item

variants.description: List of variants for the menu item.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of menu items.

tenantId.description: Reference to Tenant. The ID of the tenant that owns this category. (Relationship: Tenant 1:N Category)

order.description: The display order of the category.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a customer.

tenantId.description: Reference to Tenant. The ID of the tenant that owns this order. (Relationship: Tenant 1:N Order)

tableNumber.description: The table number where the order was placed.

items.description: Array of items in the order.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the order.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method used for the order (e.g., Cash, QRIS).

paymentStatus.description: The payment status of the order (e.g., Unpaid, Paid).

status.description: The status of the order (e.g., Received, Preparing, Ready).

verificationToken.description: The verification token entered by the customer for anti-spam.

uniqueCode.description: Unique code added to total price, if payment method is QRIS

Table.title: Table
Table.description: Represents a table in a cafe.

tenantId.description: Reference to Tenant. The ID of the tenant that owns this table. (Relationship: Tenant 1:N Table)

status.description: The status of the table (e.g., Empty, Occupied).

definition.description: Stores cafe tenant profiles and configuration data.
Stores user profiles, including role and tenant assignment.
Stores menu items for a specific tenant.
Stores menu categories for a specific tenant.
Stores orders placed at a specific tenant.
Stores tables for a specific tenant.
